name: Export Service Deployment app config via UI
description:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Create new organization via **API**.
- Create new project via **API**.
- Select `cpu-medium` Resource Preset.
- Set app Display name.
- Click `Export config` button.

### Verify that:

- Config downloaded as `yaml` file matches expected schema.
- Exported config contains valid data.
descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials.
  • Create new organization via API.
  • Create new project via API.
  • Select cpu-medium Resource Preset.
  • Set app Display name.
  • Click Export config button.

Verify that:

  • Config downloaded as yaml file matches expected schema.
  • Exported config contains valid data.
statusMessage:
AssertionError: [AssertionError] during step: Login via UI
Message: [AssertionError] during step: Verify Apps page displayed
Message: Apps page should be displayed!
statusTrace:
tests/reporting_hooks/reporting.py:49: in wrapper
    result = await func(*args, **kwargs)
             ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
tests/test_cases/steps/ui_steps/page_steps_impl/apps_page_steps.py:14: in verify_ui_page_displayed
    assert await self._pm.apps_page.is_loaded(), "Apps page should be displayed!"
           ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
E   AssertionError: Apps page should be displayed!

The above exception was the direct cause of the following exception:
tests/reporting_hooks/reporting.py:49: in wrapper
    result = await func(*args, **kwargs)
             ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
tests/test_cases/steps/ui_steps/ui_steps.py:86: in ui_login
    await self.apps_page.verify_ui_page_displayed()
tests/reporting_hooks/reporting.py:58: in wrapper
    raise AssertionError(formatted_msg) from e
E   AssertionError: [AssertionError] during step: Verify Apps page displayed
E   Message: Apps page should be displayed!

The above exception was the direct cause of the following exception:
tests/test_cases/tests_e2e/test_service_deployment_app.py:646: in test_export_app_config_via_ui
    await ui_steps.ui_login(user, fresh_login=False)
tests/reporting_hooks/reporting.py:58: in wrapper
    raise AssertionError(formatted_msg) from e
E   AssertionError: [AssertionError] during step: Login via UI
E   Message: [AssertionError] during step: Verify Apps page displayed
E   Message: Apps page should be displayed!

testStage.description:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Create new organization via **API**.
- Create new project via **API**.
- Select `cpu-medium` Resource Preset.

- Exported config contains valid data.
